body: Best yohariri doujin ever 9999/10, need the continuation if it will ever happen
Yoshiko telling Riko that she might’ve fallen in love with her was cute. And also the fact that she decided to quit her job :)

I don't even ship them (I'm on the YouRiko ship) but I like this so much I lost count how many times I had schlicked to this...
I believe this is one of the best prostitution doujin/manga ever made
Haven't watched love live, but this ship seems pretty top tier
